## ComponentRoute() function

Defines route for component on which is this decorator applied

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function ComponentRoute(route: Route): ClassDecorator;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  route | Route | route Definition of route, does not require component to be set |

<b>Returns:</b>

ClassDecorator
